title: Collaborators Wanted!
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20101227040617/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 26.Aug.2003 12.41pm 

We welcome your participation in a new Typophile board - this one is called "Collaborative Design" and can be accessed via the front Topics page of the Forums.   
   
Collaborative Design is your playground - an ideal spot to refine ideas and work on fun, freebie, or pro-bono projects with your fellow Typophiles.   
   
**This is not a place for spec work or contests.** If you need feedback on a commercial project, post into the Critique or Design forums.   
   
I've kicked off the board with "Typogenealogy," a collaborative font project idea that I hope you'll get involved with - or start a project of your own!   
   
 [Click here to check it out \>](http://web.archive.org/web/20101227040617/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/14800/14800.html)
author: Jared Benson
